name: Assassin’s Creed Mirage: Master Assassin Edition
description: Are you ready to give up who you once thought you were and walk the path of shadows? Elevate your Assassin's Creed Mirage experience with the Master Assassin Edition, which includes the base game, the Deluxe Pack, and five other packs.

name: Early-blooming Black Lily: Hana to Itsuki no Naisho no Hanashi 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Rogue Glitch Ultra
description: A roguelite action platformer in a vibrant glitch-ridden world. Amass a huge arsenal from over 150 weapon options and face hordes of enemies and tough boss fights.

name: Hearthstone: Showdown in the Badlands
description: The Bloodrock Mining Company found powerful Azerite in the Badlands. They’re digging deep and bleeding the land dry, disrupting the Badlands and awakening slumbering elementals! Now mysterious outlaws are riding into town to set things right. Tumbleweeds roll by and high noon looms. Grab your horse and your hat, it’s nearly time for a Showdown in the Badlands

name: Golfing In Aether: Dustbowl
description: The fourth free expansion to Golfing in Aether, introducing a sandy, dusty environment along with several new levels.

name: Doppelgänger
description: Doppelgänger is a visual novel published by Cover Corporation set in an alternate universe where the player is struggling with the memories of what they know to be TEMPUS and the mysterious look-alikes who pull them every which way.

name: Saraman Union
description: Territory Management x Strategy SLG You, a very ordinary traveling merchant, unexpectedly inherited land one day from your aristocratic uncle who passed away suddenly. Now, you have become the lord of that land. However, it was not a territory governed by humans, but...

name: Remnant II: The Awakened King
description:
The One True King has awakened and is out for blood. Corrupted by the Root during his near-death slumber, the mad king sees betrayal at every turn and is on a rampage of revenge. Since his castle first arrived in a Dran coastal town, the tides are angry and the weather is chaotic, surfacing all manner of creatures from the depths and leaving many mysteries in its wake.

This DLC adds the Ritualist archetyp, a new storyline, dungeons and area based in the world of Losomn. It includes a wide array of new weapons, modifications, amulets, and rings along with new bosses, characters and fearsome creatures to encounter.

name: Endless Maze
description: Try to get to the end of the maze, if there is one...

name: Out Of Shapes
description: Drop matching shapes on each other to create larger shapes. The more shapes you combine in one drop the higher your combo score. The game ends when you run out of space.

name: Shadow Of Sound
description: Traditional 4k drop style music game —— "Shadow Of Sound".

name: Cake Game
description: Strategize, combine cakes, and bake your way to victory!

name: New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Explore New Zealand's stunning landscapes in a captivating jigsaw puzzle adventure. Unravel the beauty piece by piece!

name: House with Puzzles
description: An unexpected inheritance has forced you to come to your grandfather's mansion. Grandfather was not an ordinary man, but a former NKVD officer. The house is filled with various puzzles. And to find the will you need to solve all of them.

name: Jigsaw Together
description: jigsaw Together is a jigsaw puzzle game that supports custom materials. In this game, you can customize the number of puzzle pieces and use local images, MP4 videos, or specify web pages as background materials for playing.

name: I Can Destroy Everything!!!
description: In this game, you can destroy all objects on the map! It's a fun and relaxing way to relieve stress and entertain yourself. Give this game a try to unwind!

name: Anno 1800: Eldritch Pack
description: Dabble in darkness and add a flair of mystery to your cities with the Anno 1800 Eldritch Pack featuring over 20 Gothic-themed ornaments and Victorian-style skins.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Official Tram Extension
description: This DLC gives you access to your own trams that you can operate, buy, and customize. Tram routes become available for you to plan and create. Additionally, there are also new story missions and driving events.

name: Relgiros
description: RELGIROS, a plateform game, tests your patience and determination as it paces up surmounting obstacles, to boost you with the adrenaline rush. Through the game, the protagonist breezes through obstacles and traps, with a goal to prove worthy of the foresighted critical missions.

name: Cattie
description: Cattie is a platform game with retro graphics.

name: Victoria 3: Colossus of the South
description: Rich in culture and resources, South America enters the Victorian Age. Many challenges await nations newly freed from European dominance. Stake your claim on the future of the Southern Hemisphere in Colossus of the South, a new Region Pack for Victoria 3.

name: Find the Pairs Memo Game for Kids
description: No friend nearby to play with? Then just play Find the pairs of picture cards against an intelligent, funny cat!

name: Uh Oh Calico!
description: Prepare yourself for a challenging, strategic, exciting and fur-strating puzzle game! Inspired by the popular Watermelon Game comes this 3D cat-tastic game of combining growing cats in a confined claw machine. Make combos and get the highest score without letting any cats fall out!

name: Poly
description: Simplistic roguelike shooter, Blast your way through countless enemies while earning powerful upgrades which turn you into a shape obliterating machine! 50+ upgrades with countless synergies and stacking effects!, Unique enemies which have unique abilities.

name: Mosaic Girl Savior
description: This is an elimination adventure game. Women's country was suddenly shrouded in a mysterious force, women were played on the Mosaic of evil, in order to explore the truth behind, restore the original appearance of women's country, as the "first gentleman" you embarked on a journey.

name: Loco-Sort
description: Loco-Sort is a puzzle-solving indie game, set in the railroads of the 1880s America. You control a small locomotive with the goal of assembling a train by sorting several numbered railroad cars across a maze of rail tracks and switches. 30 challenging levels, 9 playable locomotives and much more!

name: Streetoir
description: Streetoir is a first-person / open-world / graffiti-painting game, where you paint everywhere you want and whatever you want.

name: CityDriver: Autobahn Nord
description: With the "Autobahn North" DLC for CityDriver, new routes, missions and locations await you!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Landscapes 4
description: Puzzles of landscapes!

name: Protoplanet Express
description: Embark on an exciting journey to explore distant star systems and witness the fascinating process of planet formation. In this immersive video game, you'll have the chance to learn about real protoplanetary systems based on simulations crafted by professional astronomers.

name: Park Up Car
description: You'll face infamous levels designed to be absolutely frustrating. Are you ready to tackle the most frustrating challenge of your life?

name: Hitler is my crash
description: Hitler is my Crash is an absurd adventure in which you will plunge into the world of black humor and satire. You have to take on the role of a girl who is in love with Hitler and does not want to share him, and go on an absurd journey with Hitler, who is captured by saboteurs.

name: Ruin
description: Escape the levels of Ruin in this 2D platformer with tight controls where you traverse dangerous traps and difficult obstacles.

name: Ticket to Ride
description: The cross-country train-adventure game is on its way! It's a fresh take on the iconic board game in stunning 3D. Play with friends, family and players of all ages around the world. Drive your enterprise from coast to coast and strategise as lines collide and direct routes grow!

name: Refind Self: The Personality Test Game
description:
All players approach games in varied ways, making different choices.

No one ever plays in exactly the same way. Indeed, how a person plays can be an indicator of their personality...

And Refind Self is a game where you can learn all about that personality.

name: Liminal Border Part I
description: First game of a four-part visual novel series. Nerdy Itsuki Ninomae accidentally creates a “digital hypnotism movie.” Showing it to his neighbor causes him to learn her and a classmate’s dark secret, dragging him into the underbelly of society.

name: Turok 3: Shadow of Oblivion
description:
Turok 3: Shadow of Oblivion is a faithful restoration of the classic first-person shooter originally released in 2000 for the Nintendo 64, upgraded through Nightdive Studios’ proprietary KEX Engine for play on modern gaming devices with up to a 4K resolution at 120FPS.

It joins Nightdive Studios, Universal Games, and Digital Platforms’ popular Turok and Turok 2: Seeds of Evil remasters, capping off the trilogy. Turok 3 Shadow of Oblivion Remastered features upgraded gameplay, high-resolution textures, enhanced lighting and rendering, and support for console gamepads with platform-specific features.

Finish the hunt in this epic finale to the Turok Trilogy. Pick up immediately after the events of Turok 2: Seeds of Evil, with dual protagonists Joseph and Danielle Fireseed, of the Turok family tree, as they battle the titular antagonist Oblivion and its followers, the Flesh Eaters.

name: Faded Stories: Full Moon
description: Unburied and forgotten undead gather in the city center, while the citizens of Greenberg go about their day-to-day lives.

name: The Crimson Pearl
description: The Blight has plagued The Kingdom for as long as one can remember. Ashanti and Scarlett believe they have found out a way to fight The Blight and defeat it once and for all. Their path to such solution will drastically change their lives!

name: Age of Empires IV: The Sultans Ascend
description: The Sultans Ascend – the biggest expansion for Age of Empires IV yet! Step into history as you explore new territories, lead powerful armies, and immerse yourself in the rich history of the Middle East.

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Deluxe Edition
description: Wage a campaign of brutal conquest in this realm-shattering real-time strategy game set in the Warhammer Age of Sigmar universe. Command four unique factions in dynamic battles as part of a story-driven campaign and test your mettle in online multiplayer.

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Ultimate Edition
description: Wage a campaign of brutal conquest in this realm-shattering real-time strategy game set in the Warhammer Age of Sigmar universe. Command four unique factions in dynamic battles as part of a story-driven campaign and test your mettle in online multiplayer.

name: Gubbins
description: Gubbins is a friendly puzzle game where you place tiles to construct words, with the help and hindrance from weird little pals called Gubbins. Minimalist typography alongside mischievous cartoons serve as a kooky canvas for moreish wordplay. It’s essentially Solitaire meets Scrabble with hilarious friends wreaking havoc.

name: Invincible Presents: Atom Eve
description:
Become Atom Eve and take control of your own path as one of the most powerful superheroes in the Invincible universe! Unravel a mystery and balance the dangers and responsibilities of being a superhero with the relatable challenges of everyday life.

Experience an original story with striking art directed by Rossi Gifford and creative direction by award-winning writer Jill Murray, and explore the life of Atom Eve in a world filled with beloved characters. Based on the comic book by Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, and Ryan Ottley.

name: Entity: The Black Day
description: Entity: The Black Day is an action and psychological horror game with a long psychological story The game is developed on Unreal Engine

name: Full Void: Special Edition
description:
Complete with the included comic from the standard edition, this Special Edition also includes an exclusive blue coloured cartridge, stickers, poster, an exclusive cart inlay and an art book, all in one cardboard sleeve.

Full Void by OutOfTheBit is a modern indie title for Evercade, heavily inspired by classic 16-bit cinematic puzzle platformers. Taking on the role of a nameless teenager in a futuristic dystopia, you must fight back against the rogue AI that has enslaved humanity!

name: Ratyrinth
description: You are drastically separated from your family in a scary forest with dangerous creatures, and you have to find them again! Ratyrinth is a cute and challenging precision platformer.

name: Paper Can't Fly
description: Fly, Build & Share! Soar through the most challenging of levels and unleash your creativity by building your own. The sky is the limit!

name: Super Crazy Rhythm Castle
description: It’s Super Crazy Rhythm Castle, the chaotic rhythm adventure! A puzzling co-op mashup unlike anything you've ever heard. Solo, or with a band of up to three friends… Can you conquer the castle?

name: Super Pocket: Capcom Edition
description:
A handheld from Blaze Entertainment's under their brand HyperMegaTech. The handhelds are compatible with Evercade cartridges and each edition has a different bundle of built-in games.

The 12 games contained in the Capcom Edition are 1942, 1943, 1944 : The Loop Master, Bionic Commando, Captain Commando, Street Fighter II’: Hyper Fighting, Strider, Wolf of the Battlefield: MERCS, Mega Man, Final Fight, Ghouls ‘n Ghosts and Forgotten Worlds

name: Super Pocket: Taito Edition
description:
A handheld from Blaze Entertainment's under their brand HyperMegaTech. The handhelds are compatible with Evercade cartridges and each edition has a different bundle of built-in games.

The 17 games contained in the Taito Edition are Space Invaders, Bubble Bobble, Operation Wolf, The NewZealand Story, Rastan, Cadash, Chack'n Pop, Don Doko Don, Elevator Action, Football Champ, Growl, Kiki Kaikai, Legend of Kage, Liquid Kids, Space Invaders ‘91, Volfied amd The Fairyland Story

name: Farming Simulator 22: Premium Edition
description: A farmer's dream of agricultural variety: the comprehensive Premium Edition of Farming Simulator 22 contains seven content packs, two expansions (Premium & Platinum), six maps, and hundreds of authentic machines by renowned brands from all over the world.

name: Aether
description: Unleash your inner-elementalist and wield the power of magic in Aether! This action-packed rogue-lite game puts you in control of the eight fundamental elements, allowing you to rain down destruction on swarms of relentless enemies.

name: Rush On
description: Fast, score-based endless runner with procedurally generated levels. Perfect for a quick, intense game whenever you got a few minutes.

name: The Idolmaster: Shiny Colors - Song for Prism
description: The Idolmaster: Shiny Colors - Song for Prism is a free-to-play rhythm game based on The Idolmaster: Shiny Colors.

name: KarmaZoo
description: Share the love and die trying! KarmaZoo is a joyful, altruistic, cooperative platformer where up to 10 random players help each other with the unique abilities of 50 different characters - all for the sake of good Karma.

name: Death Must Die
description: Descend the nether in search of Death himself! Choose from God-given powers to slay his hordes of minions. Unlock new heroes, collect powerful items and create game-breaking synergies in this roguelite hack and slash survivors game.

name: UFO Robot Grendizer: The Feast of the Wolves - Deluxe Edition
description: For the first time in the video game history, climb aboard Grendizer the Legendary Robot and fight the forces of evil to defend our planet Earth!

name: Not For Broadcast: Bits of Your Life
description: Think you know Peter Clement? Show the new enigmatic Prime Minister in a whole new light on the always popular chat show, "Bits Of Your Life"!

name: UFO Robot Grendizer: The Feast of the Wolves
description: For the first time in the video game history, climb aboard Grendizer the Legendary Robot and fight the forces of evil to defend our planet Earth!

name: Love's Crescendo
description: On a cold winter day, Valerie and Cadence are brought together through their shared love of music. Determined to hear more of the talented pianist’s tunes, Valerie seeks Cadence out in hopes of making something beautiful. Little did they know that their composition would blossom into something more…

name: Space Mercenary Defense Force
description: Defend against the alien invasion and take down the mother ship! Utilise branching upgrade trees, unlock new ships, and equip permanent upgrades to create your own unique build and defeat the growing hordes of invaders in this sci-fi action roguelike!

name: The Dot
description:
But what did he try to say with this game? Was he happy? Did he enjoy creating video games at all? Or did he even create the game he wanted?

Go ahead, try to unpack this person

name: Misty's Shining Blacksmithing
description: A world called Fillwitz has finally ushered in an era of peace after the long war between mankind and the demon. But Misty, who lives in the underground city of Gondalva and runs a blacksmith shop, is distressed by the sharp reduction in work caused by the peace.

name: Metalstorm
description:
Join real-time battles in the high sky, command your own fighter jet and team-up to destroy your enemies in intense and realistic air combat battles.

Check out the extraordinary variety of fighter jets, maps, modes, and possible strategies that this air combat game has to offer!

A truly free-to-play game. Real PvP Multiplayer! Join a squadron & fight for the victory. Play & chat online with your friends against real players around the world.

name: Backpack Hero
description: Backpack Hero is the inventory management roguelike! Collect rare items, organize your bag, and vanquish your foes!

name: Dungeons of Mysteria
description: A procedurally generated Dungeon Crawler

name: Astral Ascent
description: Choose one of four heroes and explore the Garden, an astral prison guarded by 12 powerful mystical bosses: the Zodiacs. Challenge them with dozens of unique spells and faithful friends by your side to unfold the story of this platform roguelite with lightning fast combat.

name: Gods of the Twilight
description: Cyberpunk Ragnarök in visual novel form! Gods of the Twilight is a multi-season episodic visual novel that puts you in the shoes of two reincarnated gods facing a pending apocalypse. Decide how to handle the supernatural and human organizations that each have their own plans for you, while ancient truths about you and your companions start to resurface.

name: Orbitect
description: Orbitect is a space station sandbox building game with management elements and an emergent narrative system.

name: Coral Island
description:
Coral Island is a re-imagined farm sim game inspired by classics. Grow crops, nurture animals, and befriend the islanders. Decide whether to revitalize not only the town but also the surrounding coral reefs.

Promising to keep intact what makes classic farm sim games fun, Coral Island aims to modernize and make the experience more inclusive. We feature a large cast of diverse characters and weave environmental awareness into the core game loop — all the while keeping it a wholesome good time.

name: Howl
description: Howl is a turn-based tactical folktale set in a world of living ink, where the sound of a ‘howling plague’ turns people into feral beasts. Rid the lands of the plague using your crossbow, magic skills and your wits, planning every move up to six steps in advance. Some think prophecy is carved in stone – write your own in ink and blood.

name: Residiuum: Tales of Coral
description:
Explore a universe rich in personality and full of mysteries.

After the sun went mad and exploded, all that was left of the world was the Auric Earth. A region divided between the Elite with their suited men and their experiments and technologies with the multi-purpose gas Sig, and the less fortunate who must deal with gangs of criminals of various kinds and a hostile environment full of toxic and poisonous substances.

name: Hidden World of Art 4
description: A hidden object game where you try to find things in famous paintings.

name: Dance Hero: More Jiggle
description: Dance Hero: More Jiggle is a Dance/Rhythm/Twerk and Customization Simulator with many unique features. Twerk through the story, hire many interesting characters to dance with, explore a huge city and even customize your main character with clothes from real-world fashion brands!

name: My Crazy New Fake Love Life
description:
You live in the shadow of your twin brother, the golden boy of your family. Though you’re perfectly content with that, when your brother gets into an accident and ends up in the hospital with amnesia, your parents have you step in to take his place at his elitist school.

Pretending to be your brother until he regains his memories, you find yourself now balancing complex relationships with three beautiful girls.

Can you successfully fool everyone and succeed with your entire family depending on you?

name: Blue Mushrooms
description:
Blue Mushrooms is a SMB1 Rom Hack that modifies some stuff of the original game.

Plot: Now that Bowser was defeated, there’s one more thing Mario (and Luigi maybe) must do: save the last Toad… So our heroes will need to explore the new areas beyond the unknown, where the Sun’s illumination doesn’t show. . .

Features:
- New 33 levels
- Some sprites and color palette have been modified
- Mario, Goombas, Koopas… Almost everyone are a bit faster!
- Red mushroom it’s a bit more powerful; you can throw (slow) fireballs!
- Goombas now can revive if you crush them
- Coins value are now 2 instead of 1
- And more stuff!

name: Exoterrestrial
description: Exoterrestrial is a set of 5 MBF21-compatible maps that use Tango's Minicharge mod (You DON'T need to download it separately). The maps are mostly easy and pretty different from NoReason's standard fare, with the only exception of the final fight of map05.

name: Vanilium
description: This is a simple map, made in roughly 8 hours with speedrunning in mind. This level has also been built and tested with Nightmare! difficulty and is easily beatable. Can you find the fastest exit route?

name: Truck Simulator: Driving School 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: Time Flies Like An Arrow
description: A short game playdate developed during PlayJam4

name: Gotcha Number for Playdate
description:
OK Inspector! You are kidnapped! Gotcha! You must figure out how to escape the room within 10 minutes...and then... your time is up!! Got your number!! Point and click and piece clues together... Use your magnifying glass and search around. It reminds me a little of the first part of Dove and War game, but without WW2 theme...

Tilt to look around room. Hurry!

P.S. Now with answer video!

name: Brawl.io 2
description: Destroy, build tactics, and destroy as many enemies as possible on your way!

name: Hentai World: GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: FPV SkyDive: FPV Drone Simulator - Flight School
description: Continue your journey towards becoming a skilled FPV pilot with ORQA FPV.SkyDive Flight School DLC! This educational module covers the topics of FPV flight throughout 5 units packed with theory and practice.

name: Sclash: Pixels
description: A retro touch to spice up your look in Sclash. Wear a mask and carry a weapon with a low resolution! Includes a new weapon & a new mask, directly unlocked.

name: Wars Across The World: Dacia 101
description: Dacia 101 is Emperor Trajan's first campaign against the Dacians, the empire's last sedentary neighbors. The Romans must crush seize their foes and take their cities. The Dacians player must hold his strongholds, while at the same time waging war within the Roman lands to force them to negotiate.

name: Crescent Quest: Furry Home Expansion
description: This expansion adds another room to your house with a furry aesthetic and a few wallpapers for your device!

name: Blazing Sails: Limbs of Lore Pack
description: A true pirate knows that appearance is just as important as skill. So, don't just engage in our epic pirate battles; compete in style too. Keep an eye out for those fresh pirate patches, trade a leg for an anchor, and your hand for a hook, unless you'd rather resemble an octopus.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of Normandy Battlepack 3
description: Heroes of Normandy Battle Pack 3 has 12 scenarios. The scenarios cover battles spanning the D-Day drops, fighting the Norman hedgerows and Operation Market Garden.

name: Trainz Plus: CD Bmteeo 124
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CD Bmteeo 124 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Bamboo
description:
Bamboo is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly running and cutting bamboo that grows in random places. You score points by collecting bamboo. You can run through yellow bamboo to collect it. When bamboo becomes green, you have to cut it multiple times to stop it and you don't get any points from it. Your goal is to stop bamboo from growing and reaching the top.

The game is over when bamboo reaches the top of the screen.

name: Bingo TV
description: Sin descripción

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CD Bmto292 109
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CD Bmto292 109 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Plus: CD Bmto292 109
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CD Bmto292 109 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CD Bmto292 109
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CD Bmto292 109 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Plus: CSD Bap 117
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CSD Bap 117 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CSD Bap 117
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CSD Bap 117 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CSD Bap 117
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CSD Bap 117 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CD Doubledecker Pack No. 2
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features 8 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Frontline 1942: Battles of the World War 2
description: Immerse yourself in the times of World War II and become a real hero! Shoot, capture, win – the path to glory is paved with shells!

name: Baker Street Breakouts
description:
"Baker Street Breakouts" combines the thrill of an Escape Room with the storytelling of an Adventure. Use your superior deduction skills in this story-driven mystery to help Sherlock deducing his way through an old film studio to finally face his arch nemesis Moriarty. Become a Master of Deduction!

"Baker Street Breakouts" focusses on puzzles and deduction. Instead of combat or grinding, the game challenges players to use their superior deduction skills and the ability to combine items in order to solve riddles and progress through the game. Explore, investigate, combine, deduce!

name: To Infinity
description: To Infinity tells the adventures of a schizophrenic astronaut. The astronaut escapes from the world and goes to search for other planets where he can live with his spaceship, and in the meantime, he constantly makes parkour, witnessing the epic view of the universe.

name: Dungeon Core Master
description: Adult-Only Fantasy Visual Novel featuring 3 girls, a variety of choices, comedy, and sex in an exciting story with different endings!

name: Tentacle Temptation
description: A dangerous slime is on the loose! With its abilities you can solve novel and progressively difficult levels in order to please your harem of beautiful women. A questionable, brain-teasing hentai adventure to break into the mind.

name: Witch Academy
description: Dance training even though it's a witch school? Sharpen your magical powers and aim for the top in the entertainment world!

name: Phantom Thief Sylphy 2
description: The titular busty bespectacled phantom thief finds herself trapped in the domain of a demon known as The Collector. Can she beat his challenge and escape, or will she succumb to the sweet torment he offers. You decide! A hardcore hentai game filled with delightful downfalls.

name: Choose Your Cutie
description: The girls are ready to meet you! Each of them is special. Choose your cutie!

name: 3D Puzzle: Farming 2
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Project Stocks: Multiplayer
description: Play project stocks with others!

name: 3D Puzzle: Kingdom in Dark
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Hanabi
description: Connect vertical, horizontal, curved, and crisscross ropes well,Burn the ropes to ignite the fireworks balls!Let's set off beautiful fireworks!

name: Empire: Galaxy Burning
description: A shoot-em-up game (loosely) inspired by the likes of Crimson Clover, Mushihimesama and R-Type, battling against an ancient superweapon to save both the galaxy and a close friend!

name: To The Star
description: Be a crow and break the code in the witch's hut and escape!

name: Galactic Heroes: Rise of the Black Alliance
description: Embark on a perilous journey as Max, the space ranger, to hunt down the leaders of the Black Alliance. Pilot different spacecraft, dodge asteroids, battle enemies, and confront ruthless leaders. Become a true hero of space!

name: Catast
description: This game is a puzzle game in which you destroy blocks with simple controls! Find a route to destroy many blocks at once and enjoy the pleasure of destroying them all at once!

name: Doashime
description: Dive into the chain boarding game "Doashime: Close the Door!" and fill the train with cute animals. While avoiding being spotted by station staff, chain same-colored animals for points, and ensure they board. Score until the last second and ascend to the top of the global rankings.

name: Traversion
description: Introducing Traversion, a movement-based arcade platformer with a focus on rocket jumping, strafing, and grappling to navigate levels as efficiently as possible. Enjoy a minimalist, skill-based experience where the primary goal is to achieve faster completion times and hone your senses.

name: The Hospital of Fear
description: The Hospital of Fear - indie horror from the first person, in the genre of walking simulator. The main focus is on the atmosphere of horror, which is emphasized by realistic 3D graphics and immersive sounds, as well as a well-developed storyline with two endings.

name: New Zombie
description: Military agent Harvey Heller, having received orders, flies with his team to protect a group of scientists who are to create a vaccine. But halfway to his goal he finds himself in a small town where he saves a little girl. From this moment begins his long and not easy journey.

name: Sybaritic Extravaganza
description: Sybaritic Extravaganza is an RPG game where you have to help the protagonists fulfill the last wish of Caravella king and awaken the peoples for the last war with the monsters.

name: Project Stocks
description: A darkly humorous and wacky trading simulator. Engage in market manipulation, insider trading, and ruthless deal-making as you battle AI tycoons and human traders. Short, speculate, form alliances, betray, and bend the rules to build your fortune.

name: Violet Kingdom
description: A single player RPG adventure

name: Let's Be a Mouse
description: Let's Be a Mouse is a fun and engaging game that allows players to experience life through the eyes of a mouse.

name: Mercenary Warriors
description: Mercenary Warriors is a Turn Based PVP Strategy Game set in a fantasy world. Create your own team selecting 9 of the multiple warriors available to you and rise to the top.

name: Love Potion
description: Love Potion is an engaging visual novel that takes players on a heartfelt journey through the complexities of love and self-discovery.

name: Backstab
description: Players will play as samurai who have been sent to a mysterious island, adventure with other NPCs who have been teleported here, and experience backstabbing together, and former enemies may become allies, and eventually everyone's beliefs will be unified, and a new "Kingdom of Faith" will be born.

name: Geotra
description: In this colorful twin-stick shooter inspired by 2000's-era Flash games, survive several waves of uniquely deadly enemies with your wits and skill. Choose wisely from a tree of upgrades after each wave to refine your strategy and bring down your foes. Live to see what lies at the end of the horde.

name: Sea of Brave: Aidan Adventure
description: Sea of Brave - Aidan Adventure is an action-adventure platform game, explore the different levels of Figon Island to discover its mysteries, find treasures, challenges and new skills. Confront and defeat Captain Skull's fearsome pirate crew that has enslaved the island.

name: Estate Agent Simulator
description: Estate Agent Simulator lets you enter the exciting world of the real estate market. You can buy, decorate, advertise, rent or sell houses. You can buy vacant land and build houses. Environmental factors will affect the rental prices of houses.

name: Samawa Idle
description: Unleash the power of specialized towers to annihilate hordes of monsters in this idle game with roguelike elements. Collect gold, level up your towers, face powerful bosses, and refine your strategy with an evolving skill tree.

name: Boing Bang Adventure
description: Boing Bang Adventure is a 2D arcade game in the style of the classic arcade game "Pang" Face more than 40 levels, divided in 7 different areas in single player or in local co-op!

name: Echoes
description: A 2D dungeon exploration game that can be played quickly.

name: Dungeon Cleaner
description: Clean and slide endlessly. Dungeon cleaner

name: Cody's Nightmare
description: Cody's Nightmare is a beautiful 2D pixel art game about a little boy named Cody who is stuck in his nightmare! His only way out is to conquer his fears! But don't worry, he won’t be alone. He will get help from his friends inspired by his favorite toys, comics, and video games.

name: Art of Golf
description: Physics based 2D golf game. Play tournaments, beat challenges or compete for high scores. Many game modes, extra sports and mini-games.

name: SokoChess Black
description: SokoChess Black is a puzzle game about pushing and capturing Chess pieces while overcoming various obstacles. Enjoy 70 different handcrafted levels with a unique twist on the Chess formula.

name: RedNeck Bowl Games
description: Bowling Game without the bowling Ball

name: Farming Simulator 22: Premium Expansion
description: Get a new map, perfect for the three new crops: carrots, parsnips, & red beet. Including 35+ specialized machines by series debutants Dewulf, Gorenc, Agrio & WIFO & more.

name: Fantasy Craft
description: Craft all day and night long full steam in Fantasy Craft. Craft alone or with your friends. You can craft and sell to buy more stuff so you can craft even more sophisticated things to sell. You can become the Master of Craft.

name: Demonheart: The Cursed Trial
description: You are a girl with a demonic heart, trapped with a group of suspicious individuals. When a demonspawn arrives, the humans start dying. Save your life and romance some shady characters!

name: Hold the Door
description: Hold the Door is a 2d pixel-art tower defence game where you influence the monsters paths by placing your towers strategically. With procedurally generated levels & waves, it's guaranteed to always provide a new experience every time you play.

name: Heli-Cats
description:
Dual elevation horizontal 2D arcade shoot 'em up co-op helicopter action!

With the world facing a desperate energy and economic crisis, rogue forces have launched a coordinated assault on a weakened allied order. Unable to respond directly under the fragile political climate, the Joint Security Alliance has turned to a special helicopter squadron known as the Heli-Cats. Their mission is to repel the invaders under the guise of a local paramilitary unit such that all actions can be disavowed should things go wrong.

name: Microcivilization
description: Incremental clicker strategy, where you expand, construct, research, fight, collect heroes and make choices between good and evil. Ascend through difficulty tiers by playing through challenge campaign going back and forth through history. Mammoths included.

name: Pirate Fighting Simulator
description: PFS is first person shooter game where you fight pirates with guns. There are also different game modes such as capture the flag and team death match.

name: Baker Street Breakouts: A Sherlockian Escape Adventure
description: "Baker Street Breakouts" combines the thrill of an Escape Room with the storytelling of an Adventure. Use your superior deduction skills in this story-driven mystery to help Sherlock deducing his way through an old film studio to finally face his arch nemesis Moriarty. Become a Master of Deduction!

name: March of Shrooms
description: March of the Shrooms is a frenetic, cheery crowd brawler that chronicles the tiny shroom's epic odyssey to unite shroomkind against the coming storm! Punch your way to unity, happiness, and berries for everyone, through a vibrant, effervescent world, full of mysteries, bubbles, and of course, shrooms.

name: Under A New Sun
description: While searching for a new home, an unexpected failure in your ship has left you stranded on a planet surprisingly similar to Earth. Discover a vast open world, hunt for food, develop technologies, and build yourself a new home to survive!

name: Koi-Koi VR: Love Blossoms
description: The story is a multi-ending that depends on your choice.We look forward to welcoming you.

name: Spirittea
description: A slice-of-life RPG set in east Asia, Spirittea is a story about a city author heading out to a mountain town to pick up inspiration for their book. In doing so, they find a magical teapot that allows them to see into the spirit world. Strange occurrences plague the town, and it's up to the player to find and appease the spirits by rebuilding their bathhouse and managing it to a high standard in order to allow them to soak away their troubles. This then frees up the townspeople, who will look to bond with you over food, games, karaoke, fishing and bug catching, giving you plenty of inspiration for your novel!

name: Tau Cubis
description:
Tau Cubis is a minimalist Tower Defense game in Space and colorful Scifi Landscapes.

Tau Cubis is taking inspiration from the classic 'Defense Grid' with extra features (collaborative Towers, instant global targeting, truly autonomous enemies).

Find a strategy to repel the onslaught of crazy robots!

name: Minigame Madness
description: Minigame Madness is a high-difficulty multiplayer party game for up to 16 players online. Compete with friends or strangers in an ever-growing collection of frantic minigames to unlock shiny badges, design awesome outfits & create epic mansions!

name: Bzzzt
description: Bzzzt is a fast-paced 2D platformer highly inspired by games from 80's. You become an artificial intelligence ZX8000 and in your newly obtained robotic body, you must prove your abilities in a series of testing chambers filled with deadly traps.

name: Blazing Sails
description:
In Blazing Sails you, your ship and crew have to battle other teams on a huge map of land and sea until one team survives.

As a battle hardened pirate you have to fulfill different tasks on your ship like steering the ship, deploying the sails, repairing ship damage and firing the cannons to crush your enemy’s. You’ll also be forced to go on land to gather different resources, weapons and ammo. But be careful to not abandon ship completely! If your ship goes down, your team goes down with it.

name: Beluflin: Beautiful Luminous Flying Insects
description:
In the small forest of Flin Woods there was a huge village of fireflies. They lit up the entire forest, and enchanted all the other animals.

Unfortunately, at some point recently, humans began to expand their city closer to this forest. As a result, the light of the fireflies was completely overshadowed by the brightness of the artificial lights. And then the firefly population began to decline rapidly.

name: Star Wars: Deathtroopers
description: Star Wars: Death Troopers is a FPS/3rd person action adventure video game. It is a game based on the novels Death Troopers and Red Harvest, both written by author Joe Schreiber. The game is divided into: Story Mode, Onslaught Mode and Multiplayer.

name: Raymundo Aventuras: The Definitive Edition
description: oh no! the bad guys did nothing wrong! you gotta kill them!, and fast

name: Underfell: One Hell of a Show
description: An Underfell Fan-Game containing multiple battles! Fight against Mettaton, the killer robot with a penchant for stardom, who hopes to finally become popular with his most daring act yet: killing a human!

name: Colour of Ineptation
description: 2 medium to short maps that I made after coming back from my summer vacation back to Taiwan and Japan

name: BoohaBlox: Arcade
description: BoohaBlox Arcade: is a Pixel-art puzzle game inspired by /Puzzle League/Panel de Pon/Tetris Attack/ games. This Arcade version is fully free, and offers the full package of the arcade mode, with 3 game modes: Marathon, Timed, and Endless!

name: Time Climber
description: Gotta climb to find time!

name: Queue Simulator
description: experience the thrill of waiting in a long line

name: Highway Moto Racing Rush 2023 Simulator
description: Get ready to burn rubber, experience the rush, and conquer the highway!

name: Resident Lover
description: Attend the prestigious Miranda's All Girls' University, hidden away in Romania. Choose to pursue the Arts, to follow your academic career, or to slack off with your friends. Along the way, face challenges, solve mysteries, and try to stay alive, as it becomes apparent that there is more to this school than meets the eye. Perhaps even find love in the chaos?

name: Trainz Plus: CD Doubledecker Pack No. 2
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features 8 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CD Doubledecker Pack No. 2
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features 8 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Waifu vs Zombies
description: Unleash the Power of the Ultimate Waifu in a Post-Apocalyptic Showdown Against the Undead Horde!

name: Orgasm Simulator 3
description: Welcome to the world of Orgasm Simulator 3 – an engaging real-time visual novel where romance and detective work intertwine in a three-dimensional virtual space.

name: Project I
description: Project I is an action-adventure game that follows the protagonist's journey to escape from an unknown laboratory and regain who he is. Defeat the enemies and escape from the lab.

name: Anonymous Hunting Simulator
description: Anonymous Hunting Simulator is a dynamic first-person shooter. Your task is to explore the location and collect ten masks to complete the level.

name: Star Stone Splash
description: Simple operation, extremely addictive. All you need to do is click, click, click.

name: Rugby League Riot
description: This sports game is must for any Rugby League fan! Choose from 17 teams, play a singles match or compete in a finals series. Unique gameplay, no controller required. Operate the ball carrier, many pass and kick options, simple defensive play. Fatigue system, commentary, TV theme design.

name: The Grand Adventures of Leo
description: Join Leo in a platform adventure has he fights the CAT MAFIA to rescue his precious Mommy!

name: Missing Stars
description: Missing Stars is a visual novel that aims to depict mental disorders and the people who live with them in a realistic, but sensitive and respectful light.

name: Trip World DX
description:
Travel across four fantastic lands and Mount Dubious in Trip World DX! Our hero Yakopoo's adventure begins when the Maita flower, a symbol of world peace and happiness, is stolen, throwing Trip World into chaos!

Fly through the air, traverse over the land, and swim through the water, collecting special items to help you find the flower and restore Trip World.

Use Yakopoo's shapeshifting powers to save Trip World from darkness! Race across the ground as a ball. Grow a tail to hit enemies—or a flower to make your enemies friendly!

This new version collects the classic handheld adventure Trip World in its original form, as well as the brand new color version bringing all new life to the world of Yakopoo! Discover how the game was made and all new secrets in the museum mode including development documents and video interviews, or go listen to one of the greatest game soundtracks ever made in the music player!

name: Asterix & Obelix: Slap Them All! 2
description: Asterix & Obelix - Slap them all! 2 is a Beat'em Up with an original story. Explore different places such as forest ruins, a vast Roman camp and even Lutèce. This dynamic game invites you to come on an adventure — with a generous distribution of slaps!

name: The Coyote Kills The Road Runner!
description: After so many years. So many failed attempts. The coyote is going to do it. Finally, the Coyote will KILL the Road Runner! But is it just the law of the jungle, survival of the fittest? Or is there something more...sinister...behind the Wiley old coyote's motivations?

name: Sidelined Futures
description: In an alternate Takumi-Verse, Miles Edgeworth's cushy, straight-A student life at Ivy U. is interrupted when a murder happens on campus. He takes it upon himself to investigate, battling his own demons as he comes face-to-face with the consequences of the law.

name: We Are Saved
description: "We Are Saved" is a short, free, first-person horror game. You are trapped alone in an underground factory rumored to be a site of cat abuse. While being pursued by the deranged inhabitant of the abandoned factory, your mission is to rescue the pitiful cats and aim for escape.

name: Half-Life: The World Machine
description: You are Flynn Weißhaupt, a computer engineer of Black Mesa who worked on the Gibson, a powerful supercomputer. Now with the Resonance Cascade, it is your mission to retrieve the data of the Gibson and destroy it. Because The Gibson is too powerful to fall into the hands of alien forces or the military.

name: Yewdow
description:
Place the arrow, change the direction of the car, and pass all the flags to clear the game.

If the car goes off-screen or hits a rock, it is a failure.

If the car hits a wall, it will flip, but the wall will disappear.

name: Barkley Gaiden 2: The Son Of Dark Draker - Barkley Shut Up and Jam: Gaiden, Gaiden Episode 1
description: A fangame based on Barkley: Shut Up and Jam Gaiden and the unfinished Barkley 2.

name: BAS
description: Experience a nostalgic throwback with this Pico-8 demake of the classic iOS game Birds and Saws. Dive into the retro charm and challenge yourself as you guide a bird, skillfully avoiding menacing circular saws to rack up high scores.

name: Soul of Butterflies
description: Soul of Butterflies is a point-and-click adventure game with a unique worldview. Players will take on the role of Anders and explore an extremely enigmatic world. Amidst indescribable struggles and fears, they will gradually piece together the truth of this world.

name: Ucube: Uyan
description: Sin descripción

name: Smoked Fish and Cabbage 2
description:
This romhack was created to test the player’s skill, patience and reflexes. It presents challenges difficult enough that a standard player may struggle, but indicators throughout are in place to help guide you to the goal. It's difficulty is between kaizo beginner-intermediate and players can expect to beat it within 1-4 hours depending on skillset.

This hack makes use of some more complicated tech that may be unfamiliar to the casual player- blue coins are in place to indicate spin jumps and green coins indicate item throws (usually shells). Color palettes and graphic choices were carefully picked to match the setting and create a tone for each level. Every level’s soundtrack was also carefully selected in an effort to create a satisfying gameplay loop as the player grinds each of the 28 courses. The map is comprised of several different zones strung together to feel like a complete world. Levels do not have a difficulty curve as there are plenty of ‘palette cleansers’ throughout. This design choice was decided to give the player a chance to breathe and continue progressing without wanting to destroy their controller in frustration after a lengthy grind.

name: Vestige of V'othlog
description: Vestige of V'othlog is a short four-level episode inspired by the classic themes of Quake. The pack was designed for 2021 re-release (KexQuake) but it has also been tested with Ironwail.

name: Drive Hard
description: A fun and addictive driving experience

name: Hoop Shoot
description: Shoot hoops over poles!

name: Horizon Midnight: Aircraft
description: Sin descripción

name: Truck Simulator Collection
description:
Here's the biggest truck collection you've been waiting for!
Hop behind the wheel, choose a mission and deliver your client's cargo on time!

name: Meet Your Oshi
description: It's your chance to meet your oshis -- all you have to do is survive the night! Five of them to be exact. Utilize point-and-click mechanics to assess cameras and maintain a printer that will DEFINITELY print a ticket -- eventually! Work to conserve power but be careful. Those oshis are just as eager to meet you and they hug really hard.

name: Gay Sex Adventures: Episode 1
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring HD graphics in beautiful decor. Tony embarks on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy. Episode 1 brings him to the local gay bar, to check it out, only to end up taking the cute bartender home after messing with him in the bar's toilet.

name: Paper io 2: Animals Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Western Redemption
description: be a woman cowboy and try to find all treasures and main treasure to finish game and beware enemy cowboys in this western shooter parody

name: Spookermarket
description: A survival horror that takes place in a supermarket. Collect all the items on your shopping list and make it out alive.

name: Lorenzo the Runner
description: 2D Mario-like platformer that takes you on an exhilarating adventure through a vibrant cityscape.

name: Defense Protocol
description: Do you have the resources and upgrades you need to leave the planet in this roguelike genre where you try to defend your base, survive, gather the necessary resources, and upgrade your technology while trying to repair your spaceship on an uncharted planet you crash-landed on?

name: The Lost Ashford Ring
description: "The Lost Ashford Ring," a captivating hidden object adventure set in the enchanting world of Victorian England. In this immersive game, you step into the shoes of a brilliant detective, hired to unravel a mesmerizing mystery that will test your keen eye and sharp wit.

name: Adverse Effects
description: Judith has been having issues sleeping, so her solution was to see her doctor. The doctor prescribed her some new sleeping pills that have some Adverse Effects. You play the recipient of these feelings; what will you do when her normal affections turn into something more?

name: Sujimon Quest
description: Gaaru must set off on a journey to capture the legendary Sujimon in order to save all the people of her village and bring back peace.

name: Tome of Fates
description: Tome of Fates, is a text-based interactive game like the Gamebook genre. Every decision you make has an impact and every path you take has its own rewards and risks. Experience an exciting and suspenseful journey as you explore the unknown and make the choices that will shape your fate.

name: Ocelot Sunrise
description: Ocelot Sunrise is a top-down action roguelite based in a unique sci fi universe, with a very broad metagame that can add a unique twist to the genre. Re-discover a universe lost to an alien threat in a detailed Comic-Noir art style.

name: Capytales: A Folk Adventure
description: Accompany Capytu on her journey against the hideous Dry Body. Challenge powerful members of Brazilian Folklore to protect mother nature using the power of Capybara spirits, solving puzzles and platform challenges. And catch all the collectibles hidden along the way.

name: Siege of Dungeon
description: “Siege of Dungeon” is a strategic rogue-lite game, where players challenge strong, cunning monsters within a limited time by combining relics and skills to build up your team. What’s waiting for you deep down in the dungeon? Could it be a rare and precious treasure, or the beginning of despair...?

name: Countess in Crimson
description: Countess in Crimson is an erotic visual novel / adventure game hybrid with a horror theme. Uncover the dark secrets of the secluded Carpathian village while engaging in passionate romance along the way.

name: Eve Online: Havoc
description:
This update includes:
- Added new content: enlist with Angel Cartel and Guristas Pirates in Faction Warfare
- Added new content: Deathless HQ station & Zarzakh system
- Added new content: Pirate Insurgencies
- New ships: Mekubal; Mamba; Khizriel; Alligator; Azariel
- Altered ship industry requirements:
-- Titans: Vanquisher; Komodo; Molok
- Updated content: AIR New Player Experience
- and more

name: Incredibous Shells
description: Sin descripción

name: DeepCover
description: In DeepCover, players solve a variety of fun and stimulating puzzles to outsmart evildoers, prevent scams, and save the day. Playing as an undercover agent, players are awarded more intel at every level they complete, used to outsmart scammers and help protect potential victims. Players are also able to customize their character, unlock new levels, play special training games, and learn additional info about real-life online scams and their impacts.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Allhallows Eve
description: Sin descripción

name: KeeperFX
description:
KeeperFX (Dungeon Keeper Fan eXpansion) is an open-source project that aims to fix up, enhance and modernize the classic dungeon management game, Dungeon Keeper. This project is dedicated to providing an improved and customizable gaming experience while staying true to the spirit of the original game.

KeeperFX is a standalone game but requires a copy of the original game files as proof of ownership. These files can be automatically copied from your old CDs, or from a digital edition like the ones from EA or GOG.

name: Galaxy Swirl
description: Sin descripción

name: Okuri
description:
Okuri (送) is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Mitsuki (みつき), exploring through it by four doors in the nexus and collecting effects.

The game has themes revolving around of death and funerals, with very soft visuals and music, giving an overall sentimental feel to the game.

name: #0 Iggy's Castle
description: An unofficial horror mod for a castle level in Super Mario World. There are multiple endings for the player to discover.

name: Strike Force Heroes
description: Strike Force Heroes is an oldschool arena shooter rebuilt with modern mechanics with full co-operative and PvP online multiplayer. It melds over the top action with epic story-telling in this intense remake of the hit Flash game.

name: Elemental Dreams
description: In this game, you play as Yousotsuki, a 14-year-old boy who loves nature. But one day, a series of natural disasters struck, causing him to lose his entire family, with only him surviving. Since then, he has begun to question whether nature really loves him or not. He then decided to go to an uninhabited place and stayed there for who knows how long to find peace and quiet and be closer to nature. He had nothing to do but sleep and explore dream worlds of elements.

name: Chicocos S.A.
description:
Chicocos S.A. is a limit-removing map (complevel 2) set in a shipping/receiving office, featuring a non-linear layout with multiple paths to get to your goal.

Clear out all the buildings and pick up all 3 keys to get into the boss arena: the theater hall...!! (which, fun fact, is a recreation of the actual theater hall where the graduation ceremony will take place!). This is a commemorative map for my highschool graduation.

name: The Fast Journey
description:
In "The Fast Journey", embark on an exciting 2D adventure as a brave frog named Rafa.
Your beloved frog, Polly, is captured by malevolent creatures.

name: My Night Sun All Games
description:
A Bundle containing all My Night Sun Games games.
Includes: 3 Xbox games and 3 Windows games.

name: Builder Flipper Bundle
description: A bundle of House Flipper and Builder Simulator.

name: Call of Duty: Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Warrior Pack
description: Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Warrior Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Case IH Farmall Anniversary Pack
description: Celebrating the 100th Anniversary of Farmall, you get two iconic Farmall tractors by CaseIH, authentically digitized: The classic six-cylinder Case IH Farmall 1066 Hydro and the modern multi-talent Case IH Farmall 120C - both continuing the enduring Farmall legacy in Farming Simulator 22.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Vault Edition
description:
The Vault Edition includes:

- Cross Gen Bundle of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
- Available in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Call of Duty: Warzone:
-- Soap Operator Pack*
-- Zombie Ghost Operator Skin*
-- Soul Harvester Tracer Weapon Blueprint*
- Nemesis Operator Pack
- 2 Weapon Vaults**
- BlackCell (1 Season) + 30 additional Tier Skips***

description: Draw, paint, choose your painting tools, and progress with Draw and Color!

name: Keep The Fire: Survival Simulator
description: Fuel Your Destiny: Ignite the Game Within!

name: OnlyUp!
description: Have a fun and remember, the path in this game is only up.

name: Jet Ski Mania: Aquatic Adrenaline Rush
description: Dive into Adrenaline: Ride the Waves of Victory!

name: Sweet
description: In Sweet, you play as Pike, a little animal who just wants to go home after work! Explore a collection of odd and dreamlike environments as you head to where you need to be. Encounter strange creatures and become friends with them during combat!

name: The Amazing Digital Funkin'
description: The Amazing Digital Funkin' is a parody Friday Night Funkin' mod based around The Amazing Digital Circus. In the mod, Boyfriend goes against Pomni and Jax.

name: Sex Drive
description: From the sickos behind Minotaur Hotel and Killigan's Treasure comes Sex Drive, a collection of gay interactive erotica about truckers. Prepare yourself for encounters with sweaty hitchhikers, fun times in truck stops, threesomes with hardworking men, long trips wearing nothing but briefs and all other kinds of trucker-related shenanigans.

name: Burning Secrets: A Bara Visual Novel
description: Embark on a journey to rescue an old wizard friend in bara visual novel Burning Secrets! Mixing high fantasy adventure with gay romance themes, Burning Secrets lets you choose between multiple routes as you journey through lush and inspiring landscapes. See the lighthearted narrative to its end while developing relationships and unlock steamy CG scenes along the way.

name: Dragon Quest +
description:
All is darkness. The Dragon Lord has captured the Princess and stolen The Legendary Hero's Ball of Light!
You are the Legendary Hero's heir. You have been assigned a most dangerous task: to rescue the King's daughter and retrieve the Ball of Light.
The journey ahead will be tough, but it is your destiny. Three Sages await your arrival, each willing to reward you with mystical items of great power
Gather these three items, let your wits be about you as you gain experience, weapons and armor as you battle your way through Alefgard. Rest if you must!
Search out the Dragon Lord's lair and face your destiny, in the role playing epic, Dragon Quest.

name: Portal Dungeon: Character Pack - Duck
description: In the world of "Portal Dungeon", a mysterious new hero suddenly appeared, and he and his companions were ready to destroy everything.

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Harry Macdowel
description: Sin descripción

name: Polyturbo Drift Racing Simulator
description: "Polyturbo Drift Racing Simulator" offers a heart-racing blend of simulation and racing, providing hours of excitement for players of all skill levels. This game promises thrilling competition and intense action. Take the wheel and prove you're the ultimate racing champion!

name: Village Tycoon: Farm City Simulator
description: Village Tycoon: Farm City Simulator is a fun and addictive farming simulation game that challenges players to develop their farming capabilities and turn their small village into a bustling metropolis. With beautiful and fun buildings, expansions, and a variety of crops to grow, players must manage their farmfields, produce goods, and deliver orders to their citizens and neighbors to keep them happy and earn cash and XP.

name: Survial
description: This is a classic RPG game.

name: Monkey Splash!!
description: Monkey Splash!! is an arcade, action-platformer featuring monkeys, diving, and historical landmarks! Fire your funky monkey up these colossal structures, avoiding rivals along the way to achieve the ultimate dive! It's time to splash!!

name: Drone Flight Simulator Online
description: Enjoy freedom with Drone Flight Simulator Online. Unlimited flight experience awaits you in the sky.

name: Red Eye

name: Star Overhead
description: Star Overhead is a short but challenging 2D platformer following a retired military chaplain turned pastor. On his deathbed, he uses his connection to music to process his journey into the great beyond.

name: Do I Know You?
description: Do I Know You? is a very short visual novel about a man visiting his mother with dementia.

name: Orb Hunter
description: In a world filled with darkness, orbs infused from darkness are spread around the world. You are an Orb Hunter and orb hunting you do. Join us in a Third-Person Dark Fantasy Action Game, and lets find gold and glory.

name: Downstairs
description: Developed and published by Levienze Games, this game is a short story based horror and thriller game.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2024
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2024 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Robo Rush
description: Robo Rush is a fast-paced action platformer focused on finishing one level as fast as you can!

name: Sign Craft: Simulator
description: Sign Craft: Simulator puts you in the steel-toe boots of a Sign Technician! It is a 3D first-person game that allows you to utilize power tools and equipment to construct signs!

description: Discover the new magical Trotties adventures with their amazing videogame, perfect for your little ones!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Nature
